discord_config.description: Discord webhook configuration for agent updates and rescue messages

agent_updates.description: Webhook for agent work updates and status messages

rescue_messages.description: Webhook for agent stall detection and rescue messages

error_monitoring.description: Webhook for error monitoring and critical alerts

setup_instructions: 1. Create Discord webhooks in your server
3. Ensure the webhook channels exist and have proper permissions
4. Test the webhooks by running a test message
5. Monitor the logs to ensure messages are being sent successfully
